abstract: The Australian division of General Motors restored the presciently designed concept in time for the country's largest concours.
snippet: The Australian division of General Motors restored the presciently designed concept in time for the country's largest concours.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Buick Division of General Motors Corp

lead_paragraph: While automakers once famously, or perhaps infamously, destroyed concept cars after they outlived their usefulness for auto show displays, some manufacturers, recognizing the appeal of old iron, have begun revisiting past glories.

headline.main: Holden Restores 1969 Hurricane Concept, a Car With 21st-Century Ideas
